Job Info:
Revcloud · Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan (Hybrid)  
1 week ago

 · 95 applicants
Job Desception:
About the job
            

 
About Revcloud:Revcloud is helping businesses use data to grow and we match you with low cost global teams to push your business to the next level. Imagine if you had all of the potential buyers of your products and services in your database, you knew what they liked to read, how to get them to talk to you, and you could use machine learning and AI to generate leads and grow your revenue. Revcloud is data you need, the playbooks proven to grow your business, and the low cost global teams to do the work.Job Summary:We are looking for an AWS Data Engineer to join our team. As a data engineer, you will be responsible for designing and implementing scalable, reliable, and efficient data pipelines on AWS cloud infrastructure. You should have at least 2+ years of experience working with AWS data technologies.Key Responsibilities: Design and develop data ingestion pipelines using AWS Glue, S3, and other relevant tools.Work with stakeholders to identify data requirements, data sources, and data transformations.Implement data quality checks and data validation procedures.Optimize data pipelines for performance and scalability.Troubleshoot and resolve data pipeline issues.Develop and maintain technical documentation.
Required Skills and Experience: At least 2 years of experience in AWS data engineering.Familiarity with AWS Glue, Athena, and S3.Strong programming skills in Python.Experience with SQL and relational databases.Experience with data modeling, data warehousing, and ETL.Familiarity with AWS Lambda and CloudFormation.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Education and Certifications: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.AWS certification, such as AWS Certified Developer - Associate or AWS Cloud Practitioner is a plus.
Working Conditions: This is a hybrid position, you will be required to work from our Lahore office 3 days per week. 3 days/week on-call availability will be required.Working with a team in different time zones may require flexibility with working hours.If you meet the requirements and are passionate about working with data technologies on AWS cloud infrastructure, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity as an AWS Data Engineer.

Job Info:
Careem · Karāchi, Sindh, Pakistan (Remote) Reposted  
2 weeks ago

 · 810 applicants
employees: 1,001-5,000 employees · IT Services and IT Consulting
Job Desception:
About the job
            

 
Careem is building the Everything App for the greater Middle East, making it easier than ever to move around, order food and groceries, manage payments, and more. Careem is led by a powerful purpose to simplify and improve the lives of people and build an awesome organisation that inspires. Since 2012, Careem has created earnings for over 2.5 million Captains, simplified the lives of over 50 million customers, and built a platform for the region’s best talent to thrive and for entrepreneurs to scale their businesses. Careem operates in over 70 cities across 10 countries, from Morocco to Pakistan.About The RoleCareem Grocery is on a mission to reinvent the way people shop for grocery, pharmacy and retail products. As an exciting new vertical within Careem (a startup within a startup), we’re in the early stages of building our product and have plenty of interesting and fundamental challenges to solve in order to achieve our ambitious growth goals in this burgeoning space.As a Data & Analytics Analyst, you’ll be responsible for bringing data orientation into decision-making across functions and topics within Grocery. This is a unique role with the opportunity to create genuine impact for the lives of everyday people in our region.We’re looking for someone with an amazing understanding of the online grocery market. Our ideal candidate is someone that excels at analysing data, makes data-driven recommendations and that relentlessly focuses on customers and desires to understand their current & future needs.What You’ll Do Be the custodian of the key business metrics and analyses that powers business decisions  Structure the analyses needed to answer key business questions, work with analysts to perform analyses and derive insights Translate data into insights in clear, concise and actionable presentations/reports to guide business decision and present to grocery leadership team Drive business growth through product funnel enhancements Designing experiments to test whether the interventions will drive growth for the business Build a strong feedback loop on product features with the product team Work very closely with the commercial teams across markets to scale product features’ roll-out Optimize & automate dashboards and reports to serve day-to-day data and analytics requests Create new data platforms where needed to unlock new types of insights 
  What you’ll need Successful candidates will have a passionate commitment to improving the lives of people, an insane focus on excellence and customer centricity, and a strong alignment with our core values and purpose.An enthusiastic and driven professional who is excited about understanding the business context and nuances, translating business asks to analytics requests, lead the analysis and derive business insights. 1 Year of work experience in analytics roles in a high-growth tech startup or similar data-heavy, product environments Proficient in SQL and Tableau or equivalent visualization tool (with 1 year professional experience)  Hands on experience with Python Strong presentation skills and an ability to communicate complex findings to various audiences in a clear manner both written and verbally An excellent communicator with any audience with stellar stakeholder management – You can easily explain complex concepts to people of any level Grittiness. You never hesitate to roll up your sleeves and address something hands-on, you persevere when others fall away 
What We’ll Provide YouWe offer colleagues the opportunity to drive impact in the region while they learn and grow. As a Careem colleague you will be able to:  Work and learn from great minds by joining a community of inspiring colleagues.  Put your passion to work in a purposeful organisation dedicated to creating impact in a region with a lot of untapped potential.  Explore new opportunities to learn and grow every day.  Enjoy the flexibility that comes with the trust of being an owner; work in a hybrid style with a mix of days at the office and at home, and remotely from any country in the world for 30 days a year with unlimited vacation days per year.  Access to healthcare benefits and fitness reimbursements for health activities including: gym, health club and training classes.

About our work @ Taleemabad:We began our work seven years ago, with a very simple idea: learning’s gotta be fun. You’ve probably experienced this at some point if you’re lucky: you’ve been so engrossed in something that time’s flown by, the day has turned to night, and you’ve had the time of your life. Careem is building the Everything App for the greater Middle East, making it easier than ever to move around, order food and groceries, manage payments, and more. Understanding of promotion metrics. Promo selection%, quantity uplift due to promotionsStrong hold of excel, G sheets. Sql coding is a plus
What We’ll Provide YouWe offer colleagues the opportunity to drive impact in the region while they learn and grow.
